strategic_reasoning: Turn 3 optimization executes the triple-ability deployment: Rothwell (+3 gold) and Blackbeard (+4 gold) generate +7 gold total for 11 gold reserve = 3 VP cycle-end conversion potential. Varro surgically degrades P3's BAR_02 position from 5 to 4 cubes. Full 9-cube influence pool deployed: 3 to COURT_011 (flipping Harbormaster control from P2's 2 to my 3/4 majority), 4 to MKT_01 (highest-VP empty Market square at 4 VP), 2 to DOC_02 (extending Docks chain adjacent to my DOC_01 fortress). Shadow Network petition (10 VP) may be completable if COURT_010 and COURT_014 remain under my control from earlier turns - orchestrator should verify. VP trajectory: 110 base + 3 (gold conversion) + potential 10 (Shadow Network) = 123 VP. The Strategic Mastermind's efficiency calculus continues.
